includedAssets.title: Pilot

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: A rivalry ignites when a country music legend is put in the shade by an up-and-coming starlet in the first season of this glossy drama. Connie Britton and Hayden Panettiere star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A rivalry ignites when a country music legend is put in the shade by an up-and-coming starlet in the first season of this glossy drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A rivalry ignites when a country music legend is put in the shade by an up-and-coming starlet in the first season of this glossy drama. Connie Britton and Hayden Panettiere star.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: The superstars of Nashville find their public and private lives overlapping as they continue to fight to be country music's biggest name. Season two of the stylish drama starring Connie Britton and Hayden Panettiere.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Nashville's stars find their public and private lives overlapping as they fight to be the biggest name in country. Season two of the stylish drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The superstars of Nashville find their public and private lives overlapping as they continue to fight to be country music's biggest name. Season two of the stylish drama starring Connie Britton and Hayden Panettiere.

includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Rayna attempts to get her record label, Highway 65, off the ground, while Juliette gets a big surprise. Third season of the stylish drama starring Connie Britton and Hayden Panettiere.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Rayna attempts to get her record label, Highway 65, off the ground, while Juliette gets a big surprise. Third season of the stylish drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Rayna attempts to get her record label, Highway 65, off the ground, while Juliette gets a big surprise. Third season of the stylish drama starring Connie Britton and Hayden Panettiere.

includedAssets.title: Season 4
includedAssets.synopsis: Juliette's downward spiral continues, while Rayna tries to draw some star names to Highway 65. Fourth season of the glossy drama starring Connie Britton and Hayden Panettiere.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Juliette's downward spiral continues, while Rayna tries to draw some star names to Highway 65. Fourth season of the glossy drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Juliette's downward spiral continues, while Rayna tries to draw some star names to Highway 65. Fourth season of the glossy drama starring Connie Britton and Hayden Panettiere.

includedIn.title: Nashville
includedIn.synopsis: Take a toe-tapping trip to America's Deep South as an up-and-coming starlet ignites a rivalry with a country music legend.

synopsis: Take a toe-tapping trip to America's Deep South with this compelling country music drama starring Connie Britton and Hayden Panettiere.
